1.1.2.name: wordpress/strictly-tweetbot
1.1.2.description:
Strictly Tweetbot is designed to allow site owners to post automatic twitter messages to one or more accounts whenever an article is added to a site.

This plugin is ideal for people who regularly import content into their sites and want to make sure that one or more twitter accounts have their statuses updated with details of the account.

Features

  • Post to multiple accounts OR post multiple messages to the same account
  • Easy to authenticate using the new OAuth method. No need to register your plugin as a consumer application
  • Format your messages with easy to use placeholders e.g %title% %url% %hashtags%
  • Use your categories or post tags as the source for your hash tags
  • Dashboard report keeps you informed of status updates or failures
